column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////From beginning to end
column2: the experience was just about flawless. Bavette's Bar & Boeuf is worth the price
column3: which didn't seem outlandish for the quality of food and service. We escaped for under $100 per person (including tip) with one drink apiece
column6: and a side and two desserts split between three people.
